issue.title: May be a new default typing gadget

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body:
Hey, buddy.

I may have found a new gadget can be used to exploit jackson which can cause RCE.
I have sent the report to info@fasterxml.com

rename.from: Block one more gadget type (xbean-reflect/JNDI - CVE-2020-xxxxx)
rename.to: Block one more gadget type (xbean-reflect/JNDI - CVE-2020-8840)

issue.title: CVE-2020-8840 (Medium) detected in jackson-databind-2.9.7.jar

URL: CVE-2020-8840

Suggested Fix

Origin: https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2620

Fix Resolution: 2.8.115,2.9.10.3
